org.apache.hadoop.hbase

类 TestClientOperationTimeout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestClientOperationTimeout

  • public class TestClientOperationTimeout
extends Object
    These tests verify that the RPC timeouts ('hbase.client.operation.timeout' and 'hbase.client.scanner.timeout.period') work correctly using a modified Region Server which injects delays to get, scan and mutate operations. When 'hbase.client.operation.timeout' is set and client operation is not completed in time the client will retry the operation 'hbase.client.retries.number' times. After that SocketTimeoutException will be thrown. Using 'hbase.client.scanner.timeout.period' configuration property similar behavior can be specified for scan related operations such as openScanner(), next(). If that times out RetriesExhaustedException will be thrown.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  TestClientOperationTimeout.DelayedRegionServer 
      static class  TestClientOperationTimeout.DelayedRSRpcServices
      This RSRpcServices class injects delay for Rpc calls and after executes super methods.
